sentence.Network_en: Initially dense and fleshy, the liquorice, loganberry and dark currant flavours roll across the palate.
sentence.Network_cn: 最初是浓郁又丰富肉汁味道, 甘草 、 罗甘莓、黑加仑子的味道紧接而来.

91. 无核小葡萄 red currant92. 罗甘梅 loganberry93. 黑梅 blackberry
图文 boysenberry(波森莓)是一种blackberry(黑莓),loganberry(洛根莓)和raspberry(覆盆子)的杂交品种.因为其在市面上比较稀少,所以售价也相应的较贵,用波森莓做果酱.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from the name of John H. Logan (1841–1928), American horticulturalist, + berry

entry.def: A loganberry is a purplish red fruit that is similar to a raspberry.

means.word_mean: 1. red-fruited bramble native from Oregon to Baja California
2. large red variety of the dewberry
